materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"2b82r","text":"qPCR [Taqman]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7jlg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpp1o","text":"Standard qPCR protocols were then performed using the following primers:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"750ve","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fifd","text":"a.    Woodchuck hepatitis virus post-regulatory element [WPRE]:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8chbr","text":"        WPRE FP- GGCACTGACAATTCCGTGGT,","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8n0a","text":"        WPRE RP-AGGGACGTAGCAGAAGGACG","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23kko","text":"        WPRE probe- 5´Fam-ACGTCCTTTCCATGGCTGCTCGC -Tamra-3´.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4kn0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ok64","text":"b.    Human albumin was used as a standard:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cctpr","text":"        ALB FP-5´-TGAAACATACGTTCCCAAAGAGTTT-3´","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dh85j","text":"        ALB RP 5´-CTCTCCTTCTCAGAAAGTGTGCATAT-3´","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3o02q","text":"        ALB probe- 5´Fam-TGCTGAAACATTCACCTTCCATGCAGA-Tamra-3´.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"20m5b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fngjt","text":"c.    LV 2 for LV not using WPRE:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2glhb","text":"        LV2 FP;   5´-ACTTGAAAGCGAAAGGGAAAC-3´","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bf36i","text":"        LV2RP;  5´CACCCATCTCTCTCCTTCTAGCC-3´","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9vtda","text":"        LV2 PROBE ; 5´.FAM AGCTCTCTCGACGCAGGACTCGGC-TAMRA-3´","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"657is","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65pn1","text":"Relative quantification of WPRE/LV2 and albumin content compared to reference batch [virus of known titre] was performed by the ΔΔCT method.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8evq4","text":"When aliqouting the virus, prepare 1 vial with 6 μl for titration. This vial must go through one cycle of freeze / thaw before titration and if you want to titer in conjunction with aliqouting you can put the vials on dry-ice for a bit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7o1mj","text":"Seed cells in 6 well plates seed 100,000 cells - in   -  . For each virus  - 3x wells are required. Plate 6x additional wells for control and reference batch.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":52,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dk7jo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"2","guid":"1A6245E067BD11EB9C932F1E8D9B0CE1","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"3","guid":"204BF1E067BD11EB9C932F1E8D9B0CE1","id":0,"label":"media","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6gjmg","text":"Dilute the virus 1:10 before adding it to the cells [  +  ].","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8nuud","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"54","guid":"4FD65AE067BD11EB9C932F1E8D9B0CE1","id":0,"label":"PBS","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","guid":"5A8C831067BD11EB9C932F1E8D9B0CE1","id":0,"label":"virus","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"804c1","text":"Then add 3 μl, 10 μl and 30 μl of the diluted virus to the cells [corresponding to 0.3 μl, 1 μl and 3 μl undiluted virus].","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5ti6n","text":"Look at the cells under the microscope and compare with control.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8qa0d","text":"Remove media and wash 1x with    [Use 1000 ul pipette and don´t add the PBS directly on the cells to avoid flushing them off].","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d1hjd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","guid":"D34F46C067BD11EB9C932F1E8D9B0CE1","id":0,"label":"PBS","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"80v1c","text":"Add   and leave for a few minutes in the incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2dhb2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","guid":"F8F4933067BD11EB9C932F1E8D9B0CE1","id":0,"label":"trypsin","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"22k39","text":"After incubation with trypsin, add   and transfer cells to 1.5 ml tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2oluu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"500","guid":"24580ED067BE11EB9C932F1E8D9B0CE1","id":0,"label":"PBS or Media","unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bbtbf","text":"Remove supernatant with a pipette to not disturb the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e6818","text":"Make a master mix of   +   per sample and resuspend the pellet in  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4voj6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"200","guid":"58EB60C067BE11EB9C932F1E8D9B0CE1","id":0,"label":"PBS","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"20","guid":"5F3A855067BE11EB9C932F1E8D9B0CE1","id":0,"label":"Protein K","unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"220","guid":"6DCB289067BE11EB9C932F1E8D9B0CE1","id":0,"label":"mastermix","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9cg7t","text":"Add   [w/o ethanol] and mix thoroughly by vortexing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"45svr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"200","guid":"A85E94B067BE11EB9C932F1E8D9B0CE1","id":0,"label":"Buffer AL","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7f70d","text":"Bring samples to DNA isolation room and follow the instructions from the Qiagen DNeasy Protocol: Purification of Total DNA from Animal Blood or Cells [Spin-Column Protocol]. Start with incubation at   for   and then move directly to step 3.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":199,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":205,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2q64","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"FA7F0E5067BE11EB9C932F1E8D9B0CE1","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"56","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"FF8EAE0067BE11EB9C932F1E8D9B0CE1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

title: Titration of Lentivirus
